description: League of Legends (LoL), commonly referred to as League, is a 2009 multiplayer online battle arena video game developed and published by Riot Games.

0.0.1.description:
### How to play:
1. Download the lol.apworld file
2. Place your lol.apworld file in your worlds folder (usually /lib/worlds/)
3. Run ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
4. Click "Generate Template Settings".  This will open file explorer
5. Find "League of Legends.yaml" and copy it to /Players/ (create this folder if it does not exist)
6. Open the YAML file and change the line that says "name: Player{number}" to your desired player name.
7. Adjust the settings in the YAML to your liking
8. Run ArchipelagoGenerate.exe
9. Take the newly created AP_XXX.zip file in /output/ in upload it here: https://archipelago.gg/uploads
10. Open ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
11. Click "LOL Client" and connect to your server hosted on archipelago.gg
12. Set your API Key by running /set_api_key XXX (You can get an API Key here: https://developer.riotgames.com/)
13. Set your Summoner Name by running /set_summoner_name XXX
14. Collect your starting items by running /receive_starting_items
15. Check for valid checks after winning a match by running /check_last_match
0.0.1.title: LOL_AP v0.0.1

0.0.10.description:
-Fixed unwinnable multiworld seeds
-Starting items cannot be ranks

### How to play:
1. Download the lol.apworld file
2. Place your lol.apworld file in your worlds folder (usually /lib/worlds/)
3. Run ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
4. Click "Generate Template Settings".  This will open file explorer
5. Find "League of Legends.yaml" and copy it to /Players/ (create this folder if it does not exist)
6. Open the YAML file and change the line that says "name: Player{number}" to your desired player name.
7. Adjust the settings in the YAML to your liking
8. Run ArchipelagoGenerate.exe
9. Take the newly created AP_XXX.zip file in /output/ in upload it here: https://archipelago.gg/uploads
10. Open ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
11. Click "LOL Client" and connect to your server hosted on archipelago.gg
12. Set your API Key by running /set_api_key XXX (You can get an API Key here: https://developer.riotgames.com/)
13. Set your Riot ID by running /set_riot_id XXX (If you're unsure of your Riot ID, click here: https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/360041788533-Riot-ID-FAQ)
14. Change your region using /set_region X if you're not NA.
15. Collect your starting items by running /receive_starting_items
16. Check for valid checks after winning a match by running /check_last_match

0.1.0.description:
- Complete overhaul.  Items are now champions, get X LP items to win.

### How to play:
1. Download the lol.apworld file
2. Place your lol.apworld file in your worlds folder (usually /lib/worlds/)
3. Run ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
4. Click "Generate Template Settings".  This will open file explorer
5. Find "League of Legends.yaml" and copy it to /Players/ (create this folder if it does not exist)
6. Open the YAML file and change the line that says "name: Player{number}" to your desired player name.
7. Adjust the settings in the YAML to your liking
8. Run ArchipelagoGenerate.exe
9. Take the newly created AP_XXX.zip file in /output/ in upload it here: https://archipelago.gg/uploads
10. Open ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
11. Click "LOL Client" and connect to your server hosted on archipelago.gg
12. Open "Connector.exe" in the attached zipped file.
13. Play!
0.1.0.title: LOL AP v0.1.0

0.1.1.description:
- Fixed multiworld generation
- Allow for extra starting champions

### How to play:
1. Download the lol.apworld file
2. Place your lol.apworld file in your worlds folder (usually /lib/worlds/)
3. Run ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
4. Click "Generate Template Settings".  This will open file explorer
5. Find "League of Legends.yaml" and copy it to /Players/ (create this folder if it does not exist)
6. Open the YAML file and change the line that says "name: Player{number}" to your desired player name.
7. Adjust the settings in the YAML to your liking
8. Run ArchipelagoGenerate.exe
9. Take the newly created AP_XXX.zip file in /output/ in upload it here: https://archipelago.gg/uploads
10. Open ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
11. Click "LOL Client" and connect to your server hosted on archipelago.gg
12. Open "Connector.exe" in the attached zipped file.
13. When in game, click "Check for Match" in the LOL AP window.
14. Play!
